description: Break models organize data in such a way that information can be derived and extracted at any level of granularity that the user selects. Each break model can be analyzed at multiple levels of granularity and may be used to generate additional break models.
NOTE: DigIN stands for Digital Integration and is a registered trademark of EvREsearch. DigIN is no longer available.
